thread.title: Patrick Van Aanholt backs new team against ex-club Sunderland - declaring they are better
thread.title_full: Patrick Van Aanholt backs new team against ex-club Sunderland - declaring they are better

title: Patrick Van Aanholt backs new team against ex-club Sunderland - declaring they are better
text:
Rio Ferdinand jokes about joining Crystal Palace on deadline day 
And Van Aanholt believes it will be the defence that saves Palace from the drop this season. 
“Clean sheets kept us up last season,” he said. “Clean sheets wins games and I think when he came that was the first thing he said. 
“We need to stop conceding goals here now. That was the key to our success last year. 
“He gets the best out of players in training and off the pitch. He really cares about the players. Liverpool fans angry as Mamadou Sakho is sent on loan to Crystal Palace Tuesday, 31st January 2017 LIVERPOOL fans were less than happy after the club loaned out Mamadou Sakho on deadline day. 1 / 11 GETTY Liverpool fans angry as Mamadou Sakho is sent on loan to Crystal Palace 
“He showed last season how we did it. Last season he gave up everything, we lost a couple of games but then after that we had a great run and started winning more games. 
“This season should be the same, we just have to work together as a team. 
“Back-to-back games are important. We just have to win, and if we can’t win then don’t lose. We need to get at least a point.” Related articles
